title: Revisiting Clinical Outcome Prediction for MIMIC-IV

abstract: Abstract Clinical Decision Support Systems assist medical professionals in providing optimal care for patients. A prominent data source used for creating tasks for such systems is the Medical Information Mart for Intensive Care (MIMIC). MIMIC contains …
